com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.style.functions

Class SourceFunction<I,O>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.style.functions.Function<I,O>
      • com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.style.functions.SourceFunction<I,O>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - the input type
    O - the output type

    public class SourceFunction<I,O>
extends Function<I,O>
    Source functions take Feature property names as input.

    Source functions allow the appearance of a map feature to change with its properties. Source functions can be used to visually differentiate types of features within the same layer or create data visualizations. Each stop is an array with two elements, the first is a property input value and the second is a function output value. Note that support for property functions is not available across all properties and platforms at this time.

    See Also:
    Function.property(java.lang.String, com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.style.functions.stops.ExponentialStops<I, O>)
